task.title: Booting your Virtual Machine for the First Time

taskbody.context: This section will guide you through the process of booting your virtual machine for the first time using Oracle VM VirtualBox.

step.cmd: From the VirtualBox main screen, click Linux Mint on the left-hand side to ensure you have the correct operating system selected.
Click the button near the top of the screen.
A menu will appear prompting you to select a start-up disk. Using the dropdown menu, choose the Linux Mint .ISO file and click start.

The automatic boot sequence will now begin. This may take a minute depending on your system specifications. During the process, you will be presented with the menu shown in the image below. Ensure that the "Start Linux Mint 20.3 Cinnamon 64-bit" option is selected and push the Enter key to proceed.
Once the boot sequence has finished, you will be brought to the desktop environment for Linux Mint.

taskbody.result: Your virtual machine has now been booted. You are ready to install Linux Mint as outlined in the next section.
